monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Breaks hidden walls - Moves heavy blocks
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: This Monster's Max Health and Mana are increased by 12% each.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Unique Aura: When an allied Monster is getting healed above Max Health, convert 50% of that amount into a Shield.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Auto Heal
skills.description: When attacking, also heal the Monster with the lowest health in the party by 200% of Magic.

skills.name: Beating
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 45% (270%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 4
skills.description: 7 x 50% (350%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 5
skills.description: 8 x 55% (440%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Blizzard
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Chill (Debuff).

skills.name: Channel
skills.description: Applies Channel (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Combo Buffing
skills.description: Every Buff action applies one additional random Buff.

skills.name: Combo Healing
skills.description: Healing actions trigger an additional Heal on the Monster with the lowest Health equal to 30% of Magic value.

skills.name: Combo Initiator
skills.description: If this Monster acts first in the turn, it deals 25% more damage with its attack and deals an additional 25% damage hit.

skills.name: Congeal
skills.description: Unique Aura: Chill (Debuff) deals damage to enemies at the start of their turn based on their missing Mana.

skills.name: Crit Chance Focus
skills.description: Critical Chance values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Critical Boon
skills.description: On Critical Hit, 50% chance to grant a random Buff to another random Monster in the party.

skills.name: Critical Healing
skills.description: Healing actions can land a "Critical Heal" to heal for an increased amount, based on Critical Chance and Critical Damage. (Triggering any Crit-based skills)

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Eternal Heart
skills.description: This Monster's Max Health and Mana are increased by 12% each.

skills.name: Fatal Upkeep
skills.description: Aura: Poison, Burn and Congeal damage dealt to enemies is increased by 20%.

skills.name: Fire Weakness
skills.description: Fire damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Frostbite
skills.description: Unique Aura: When a Monster in the party applies Chill on an enemy, 40% chance to also apply Armor Break.

skills.name: Glorycast
skills.description: Applies Channel (Buff) to whole party Applies Glory (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Glorycast Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Channel (Buff) to whole party Applies Glory (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Glorycast Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Channel & Glory (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Healing Shield
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) also apply a Shield equal to 20% of the amount healed.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 333)

skills.name: Health Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 5% of Max Health.

skills.name: Helping Hand
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (110 + 50% Magic) Applies Sidekick (Buff)

skills.name: Helping Hand Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (150 + 55% Magic) Applies Sidekick & Regeneration (Buffs)

skills.name: Heroic Party
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party deals 1% increased damage for each Buff on it.

skills.name: Hunt
skills.description: Aura: Increases the Critical Chance of the whole party by 4%.

skills.name: Ice Hail
skills.description: 3 x 60% (180%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Ice Hail Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 55% (220%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Ice Hail Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 70% (280%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Ice Hail Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 70% (350%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Ice Hail Lvl 5
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Ice Spears
skills.description: 3 x 90% (270%) physical damage (water) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Ice Spears Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 85% (340%) physical damage (water) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Ice Spears Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 85% (425%) physical damage (water) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Ice Storm
skills.description: 1 x 160% magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Ice Storm Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 210% magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Ice Storm Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Icy Fists
skills.description: Every critical hit has a 25% chance to apply Chill on enemies. This Monster can apply an additional stack of Chill.

skills.name: Icy Skin
skills.description: When this Monster gets attacked, 50% chance to apply Chill on the attacker.

skills.name: Initial Chill
skills.description: Apply Chill (Debuff) to a random enemy at the start of combat.

skills.name: Jolly Spirit
skills.description: Aura: For each Monster in the party, the first time they use a non-damaging action in combat, the skill costs 50% less Mana.

skills.name: Life Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Life Wave
skills.description: Heal all for (300 + 7.5% Max Health)

skills.name: Life Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (250 + 5% Max Health)

skills.name: Life Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (500 + 6% Max Health)

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Upkeep
skills.description: Aura: Increases Mana Regeneration of the whole party by 10%.

skills.name: Neutral Affinity
skills.description: Neutral attacks deal 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Overheal
skills.description: Unique Aura: When an allied Monster is getting healed above Max Health, convert 50% of that amount into a Shield.

skills.name: Power Healing
skills.description: Healing actions trigger an additional Heal on the Monster with the lowest Health equal to 50% of Attack value.

skills.name: Protector
skills.description: Aura: All Monsters in the party receive 7.5% less damage.

skills.name: Purify
skills.description: Healing actions also remove 4 harmful Stacks (Bleed, Wound, Blind, Tether). Multi-Target-Heals remove 2.

skills.name: Ram Charge
skills.description: 2 x 155% (310%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Recover
skills.description: Heals 10% of this Monster's Max Health at the start of every turn.

skills.name: Supply
skills.description: Aura: Heal all Monsters in the party by 4% of this Monster's Max Health at the start of every turn.

skills.name: Sustained Heal
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (500 + 30% Magic + 3% Max Health) Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Tackle
skills.description: 3 x 60% (180%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 60% (240%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 60% (300%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 65% (455%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Taunt
skills.description: When an ally would be attacked, 25% chance to redirect the attack to this Monster. (In PvP, redirecting monster takes 15% increased damage)

skills.name: Water Affinity
skills.description: Water attacks deal 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Wind Resistance
skills.description: Wind damage reduced by 50%
